summary.span: 表示控制項，該控制項包含在螢幕上共用相同空間的多個項目。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適合用來同時允許應用程式來公開大量的資料將螢幕空間使用量降至最低。The is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data. A包含多個物件共用相同的畫面空間。A consists of multiple objects that share the same screen space. 只有一個在一次會顯示。Only one in a is visible at a time. 當使用者選取的索引標籤，該內容出來和其他內容隱藏的物件。When a user selects the tab of a , the contents of that become visible and the contents of the other objects are hidden. 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## 自訂 TabControl 控制項Customizing the TabControl Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [TabControl 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只能影響該屬性是否都存在於控制項的預設範本，並設定使用。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺化屬性清單中的 「 變更視覺結構的控制項 」 一節[透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並繫結中第二個要在第一個。The following example creates a and binds the in the second to a in the first . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)]

summary.span: 取得複合字串，這個字串會指定如何在 物件顯示為字串時，格式化這些物件的內容。

span.span: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 複合字串，指定如何在 物件顯示為字串時，格式化這些物件的內容。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合或自訂的字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需有關字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或是的，則屬性會被忽略。If you set the or of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合`Student`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`類別具有`Name`屬性中，集合`Course`物件，並會實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生的課程。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 此範例會使用將學生的名稱放入每個(繼承自)，而要顯示的內容中的每個學生的課程清單。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下列範例會實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生的課程。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 索引鍵，識別所要求的範本。The key that identifies the template being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 請參閱[內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立兩個物件。The following example creates two objects. 名`contentTemplate`指派給的並呼叫`tabItemTemplate`指派給第二個。The called `contentTemplate` is assigned to the of the and the called `tabItemTemplate` is assigned to the of the second . 所有物件包含定義中的白色矩形`contentTemplate`，除非第二個，其中包含如中所定義的灰色矩形， `tabItemTemplate`。All objects contain the white rectangle defined in `contentTemplate`, except the second , which has a gray rectangle, as defined in `tabItemTemplate`. [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplate_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplate_snip/CS/page1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplate_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplate_snip/CS/page1.xaml#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，它提供的自訂邏輯適用於選擇用來顯示控制項內容的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets a that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
A .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您會建立有一個以上相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己的邏輯，來選擇將根據每個資料物件的屬性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 請注意，是否您有不同類型的物件時，您可以設定屬性上的。Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the property on the . 如果這麼做，則不需要建立。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您有物件型別相同，但有不同的屬性，您也可以考慮使用或資料轉換子。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要建立的範本選取器，請建立繼承自類別，並覆寫方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給項目的範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果兩個而設定的屬性，則會忽略這個屬性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 下列其中之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 識別選取器實作所要求的索引鍵。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 索引鍵參考衍生類別實作實際覆寫。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 您可以也以程式設計方式新增的執行個體您類別作為資源字典中的資源。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 類別衍生自且會覆寫。A class derived from and overrides . 如需如何將您的自訂類別的對應資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和命名空間對應 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來顯示內容的以不同的方式，根據所選人員的故鄉。The following example uses the property to display the content of a differently, depending on the hometown of the selected person. [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-csharp[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Data.cs#1)] [!code-csharp[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Person.vb#1)] [!code-vb[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]

summary.span: 提供 路由事件的類別處理，當使用者按下按鍵時便會發生這個事件。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會將標示事件，為已處理，藉由設定屬性的事件資料，以`true`當使用者按 CTRL + TAB、 CTRL + SHIFT + TAB，首頁或結尾之間瀏覽物件。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between objects. 否則，此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作，您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作，可避免基底類別處理可能會變更執行階段行為的最後一個類別的類別處理常式的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

[!code-csharp[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[TabControlContentTemplateSelector#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TabControlContentTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)] 下列範例會建立針對。The following example creates a for the . 設定"Selectedcontent"的屬性建立別名， ，和屬性。Setting the property to "SelectedContent" creates aliases to the , , and properties.
